Any unit damaged by Requiem of Souls will be feared and have its movement speed and magic resistance reduced for %requiem_slow_duration% seconds for each line hit up to a maximum of %requiem_slow_duration_max%. Webs never expire, and can be manually destroyed. When the maximum limit of webs is exceeded, the oldest web disappears. The movement bonus is proportional to the unit's HP"

		// substitution for modifier tooltips
		// %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_MAGICAL_RESISTANCE_BONUS% - 'd' prints the value returned by the function as an integer
		// 'd' for integer
		// 'f' for float
		// optional '-' to not abs() the values
		// optional number to specify the number of decimals to print after a float
		// eg: %-2fMODIFIER_PROPERTY_BASEDAMAGEOUTGOING_PERCENTAGE% 
		// use %% to draw a percentage sign
